name: Bard
description:
Playing certain note patterns can give you various results, like activating a power for example. 

In order to play a note, you'd have to press either the primary, or secondary key once. 

To cycle through the instruments, you can press the 8th hotbar key. 

To switch octaves, you can press the 9th hotbar key. 

To change the key signature, you can press the load toolbar key. 

To change the scale, you can press the save toolbar key.
